**Emergency/Urgent Services:**

‚Ä¢  Passport (Rapid processing - higher fee)

‚Ä¢ Call 100 (Police)

**Complete Government Services List:**

 **Identity & Citizenship:**
‚Ä¢ Citizenship Certificate (By descent/Naturalized)

‚Ä¢ Citizenship corrections & replacements

 **Travel Documents:**
‚Ä¢ Regular & Rapid Passport services
‚Ä¢ Visa services (Tourist/Business/Study)
‚Ä¢ Travel permits & extensions

‚Ä¢ Birth Certificate registration
‚Ä¢ Death Certificate registration

‚Ä¢ Trekking permits (All restricted areas)

**Government Service Fees:**

**Popular Service Fees:**
‚Ä¢  **Citizenship Certificate:** Usually free
‚Ä¢  **National ID Card:** Free for first-time
‚Ä¢  **Regular Passport:** Rs. 5,000 (32 pages)
‚Ä¢  **Rapid Passport:** Rs. 12,000+ 
‚Ä¢  **Birth/Death Certificate:** Usually free if registered on time
‚Ä¢ **Business License:** Varies by business type

 **Important Notes:**
‚Ä¢ Fees may vary by district
‚Ä¢ Late registration often has penalties
‚Ä¢ Express services cost more
‚Ä¢ Some services free for certain categories

 **For exact fees:** Please ask about a specific service like "passport fee" or "business license cost"
